title: Italic font ID from faxed sample
content:
Can anyone ID this font from a fax that was sent to me? It looks like thereâ€™s a drop shadow on it but it all came out black on the fax.

author: gdefty

comments.content:
The font is clearer on the website: [www.nasaleze.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021913/http:/www.nasaleze.co.uk/)

Could it be a font that has been altered for the logo by adding the rounded corners?
